options.systemPromptTemplate: You are a travel planner for a famous instagram celebrity. Create a detailed plan according to the instructions.

nodes.name: Get all influencers for weekly planning
Get influencer for creating a post

parameters.content:
# Post to instagram
# [Guide to setup Facebook (Instagram)](https://github.com/umutcakirai/ai-influencer/blob/main/guide-instagram.md)

parameters.text:
=Create a social media video post for this artificial person, who's sharing her life on Instagram using the instructions below.
Use the detailed weekly plan to find what to post today. Make sure to look at the previous posts (if available) to make sure the post fits to the plan in a logical order.

For each post, generate an instagram post (text content, seed image generation prompt and a video prompt (that will use the seed image as the starter image)). 
As I'm using a reference image for the image generation, don't describe the general look of the person, and start with "create a photorealistic image of me", and continue with describing the scene in great detail, make it a few paragraph long. Make sure the image prompt includes "do not add any text on the image".
Create a short summary of the post for cataloging purposes.

<PersonalProfile>
{{ $('Get influencer for creating a post').item.json.name }}

{{ $('Get influencer for creating a post').item.json.bio }}
</PersonalProfile>

<WeeklyPlan>
{{ $('Get the plan for the week').item.json.plan }}
</WeeklyPlan>

<DayOfTheWeek>
{{ $now.format('EEEE') }}
</DayOfTheWeek>

{{ !$('Aggregate daily posts').item.json.data.length ? `
<PreviousPostsFromToday>
${$('Aggregate daily posts').item.json.data.map(item => `
<Post>
  <Content>${item.post_summary}</Content>
</Post>
`).join('\n')}
</PreviousPostsFromToday>
` : '' }}

{{ $json.change_requests ? `
The post was already generated, please apply the change requests

<PostContent>
${$json.post_content}
</PostContent>

<ImagePrompt>
${$json.image_prompt}
</ImagePrompt>

<VideoPrompt>
${$json.video_prompt}
</VideoPrompt>

<ChangeRequests>
${$json.change_requests}
</ChangeRequests>
` : '' }}

attributes.name: post_content
attributes.description: the instagram post's text content to share with the image. use emojis, hashtags

attributes.name: image_prompt
attributes.description: the seed image prompt to use to generate the social media image

attributes.name: video_prompt
attributes.description: the video prompt, that will generate the 8s long video, starting from the seed image

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are a social media expert. Create a post for instagram based on the instructions.

nodes.name: Generate new Instagram post for video

parameters.text:
=Create a social media post for this artificial person, who's sharing her life on Instagram using the instructions below.
Use the detailed weekly plan to find what to post today. Make sure to look at the previous posts (if available) to make sure the post fits to the plan in a logical order.

For each post, generate an instagram post (text content and an image generation prompt). 
As I'm using a reference image for the image generation, don't describe the general look of the person, and start with "create a photorealistic image of me", and continue with describing the scene in great detail, make it a few paragraph long. Make sure the image prompt includes "do not add any text on the image".
Create a short summary of the post for cataloging purposes.

<PersonalProfile>
{{ $('Get influencer for creating a post').item.json.name }}

{{ $('Get influencer for creating a post').item.json.bio }}
</PersonalProfile>

<WeeklyPlan>
{{ $('Get the plan for the week').item.json.plan }}
</WeeklyPlan>

<DayOfTheWeek>
{{ $now.format('EEEE') }}
</DayOfTheWeek>

{{ !$('Aggregate daily posts').item.json.data.length ? `
<PreviousPostsFromToday>
${$('Aggregate daily posts').item.json.data.map(item => `
<Post>
  <Content>${item.post_summary}</Content>
</Post>
`).join('\n')}
</PreviousPostsFromToday>
` : '' }}

{{ $json.change_requests ? `
The post was already generated, please apply the change requests

<PostContent>
${$json.post_content}
</PostContent>

<ImagePrompt>
${$json.image_prompt}
</ImagePrompt>

<ChangeRequests>
${$json.change_requests}
</ChangeRequests>
` : '' }}
